### Education

**M.Sc. Landscape Ecology** – [University Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/Landschaftsoekologie/en/index.shtml) _(Oct 2023 - present)_  
Focus: *Remote Sensing, Restoration Ecology, Soil Ecology*  
Thesis: *What can we learn about canopy height from optical data.*  

**B.Sc. Landscape Ecology** – [University Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/Landschaftsoekologie/en/index.shtml) _(Oct 2019 - Sept 2022)_  
Thesis: *Spatio-temporal analysis of a central European bog.*
